=== Concept ===
Ubuntu desktop animated splash idea, ala Sim2 ;-) Created with Inkscape (raw XML SVG edition with animation
tags), Opera 9 to animated SVG and record_mydesktop to create the video.

Inspired by Yannis4 (usplash for hardy) ideas.
